data.title: SEIBU 1 Day Pass
data.meta_description: Plan fun day trips from Tokyo with a 1-day discounted rail pass. Visit beautiful locations of your choice like Kawagoe or Chichibu along the Seibu lines.
data.text:
Highlights

1 Day Pass for Seibu Line Trains (except the Tamagawa Line)

Flexible use: your voucher is valid for 60 days

Visit famous scenic spots along the Seibu Railway such as Koedo Kawagoe

Earn and use Rakuten points by booking with your Rakuten account!

Description

Plan fun day trips from Tokyo with a 1-day discounted rail pass. Visit beautiful locations of your choice like Kawagoe or Chichibu. You can also use the pass to make your way to seasonal activities. Plan your own self-guided tour through cities like Kawagoe and Chichibu from Tokyo. Visit various places along the Seibu lines all courtesy of your discounted pass. Depending on the season you can locate the best sakura viewing spots, summer festivals, fall colors and winter illuminations.

How it works

- Bring your passport or foreign resident card to claim your pass. - Present your voucher to the staff when you exchange the ticket. Pick up location: SEIBU Tourist Information Center Ikebukuro. Business hours: 8:00 - 15:00, all year Where to find: Ikebukuro Station 1F The Information center can be found near by the East Exit of Ikebukuro Station. It is located near the 1F entrance gates to the Seibu Line (The East Exit is the same side of the station which has the Seibu department store). - Check the map: https://rakuten-travelexp.net/seibu-ikebukuro-map -Please note that child tickets must be purchased with at least 1 adult ticket
